name: Z-Commedia Lumiere
effect: Priority 1. Sound Based. Reduce foe's Defense and Special Defense. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Special. If Fairy Dust Weather is active roll 1 Chance die to inflict the Foe with a random status from Poison, Burn, Frostbite or Paralysis (e.g. by using the /select_random command). -2 Accuracy
description: Alma's voice attunes with the battlefield itself, magic swaying to his command. With extravagance and emotion he summons a magical spotlight, radiating down onto his foe sentencing them to be the star of the show.
